EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_Cloud Native Roadshow_2017.Los Angeles Reminder
EmailTemplate.subject: See you Monday at the Cloud-Native Roadshow
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
We are looking forward to seeing you tomorrow in Santa Monica at the Cloud-Native Roadshow. Please review the event details below and feel free to email the team at cloudnativeroadshow@pivotal.io <[[mailto:cloudnativeroadshow@pivotal.io]]> with any questions.
Date: Monday, August 7, 2017
Time: 8:30am - 4:00pm
Location: Le MÃ©ridien Delfina Santa Monica <[[http://www.starwoodhotels.com/lemeridien/property/overview/index.html?propertyID=1135]]> Room: Espada 530 Pico Blvd Santa Monica, CA 90405 (map <[[https://www.google.com/maps/place/Le+M%C3%A9ridien+Delfina+Santa+Monica/@34.0104851,-118.4873398,17z/data=!3m1!4b1!4m5!3m4!1s0x80c2bb2b2f83f8c7:0x5e21d02cc13b908c!8m2!3d34.0104851!4d-118.4851458]]>)
Agenda:
8:30am - 9:30am Registration & Breakfast 9:30am - 12:00pm Sessions 12:00pm - 1:00pm Lunch 12:40pm - 1:00pm Presentations by our Ecosystem Partners 1:00pm - 3:45pm Sessions 3:45pm - 4:00pm Panel Q&A
Review the full agenda HERE <[[pivotal.io/event/pivotal-cloud-native-roadshow/los-angeles?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=cloud-native-roadshow-2017]]>.
We look forward to seeing you! The Pivotal Team
